commit.message:
Rollup merge of #70595 - wesleywiser:remove_unused_discriminant_reads, r=oli-obk

Remove unused discriminant reads from MIR bodies

Allow the `SimplifyLocals` pass to remove reads of discriminants if the
read is never used.

Fixes #70531

r? @oli-obk
